Name: REGENERATE
Components: V, 5, M (a prayer wheel and holy water)
Description: Vou touch a creature and stimulate its natural healingability. The target regains 4d8 + 15 hit points. For theduration of the spell, the target regains I hit point at thestart of each of its turns (10 hit points each minute).The target's severed body members (fingers, legs,tails, and so on), if any, are restored after 2 minutes.If you have the severed part and hold it to the stump,the spell instantaneously causes the limb to knitto the stump.
